items.content_html: ignite-element is a lightweight library for creating web components with support for multiple state management libraries. It allows developers to integrate Redux, MobX, or XState seamlessly while maintaining flexibility and a consistent API.

items.content_html: The Tode Server is a lightweight Express.js backend built with TypeScript. It processes uploaded package.json files to parse and resolve Node.js dependencies, providing structured data to the client for visualization.

items.content_html: StockFlow (Reflects the flow of goods in and out of your inventory) is a lightweight desktop application for efficient goods and inventory management. Whether youâ€™re running a small business, managing a warehouse, or simply need to keep track of your stock, StockFlow provides an intuitive interface to handle all your inventory-related tasks.
